description:
Aki mentions on the phone that "haru" is coming, and Keroro immediately assumes that it must be a person, not "haru" as in the season of "spring."  Then there`s a huge snafu with the Keron Army inviting the friends of the Keroro Platoon to come visit Keron... with some ulterior motive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 日向家 春,帰還 であります
